title: (x) serif logo - ITC Souvenir {Mike Y}
content:
I received this font in a client logo, no one has any idea what the font is - logo was made in the 70’s, possibly hand drawn? Anyone know of a similar font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071210203830im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/font_4452.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Jennifer Cain serif face - Romana {Florian, Rick Russ}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071210203830/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39414 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Script on "To Live And Die In L.A." OMPS cover - Mistral {Mike Y} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071210203830/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39372 "Go to next forum topic")
author: ortsaipekim

comments.content:
Can you attach an image for us to see?

- Mike Yanega

Oh there it is. Looks like ITC Souvenir.

- Mike Yanega

Definitely ITC Souvenir. That ’g’ is so distinctive.

The weight looks like Std Demi.
